item.title: Raid on upstate New York food manufacturer leads to dozens of detentions
item.description: Federal agents conducted a surprise raid at a snack bar manufacturer in Cato, New York, taking away dozens of workers

item.title: Trump says US will host next year’s G20 summit at his Florida golf club but he won't make money
item.description: President Donald Trump says the U.S. will host next year’s Group of 20 summit at his golf club in southern Florida

item.title: Judge temporarily blocks Alabama rule saying voucher students can't play sports for a year
item.description: A judge has sided with Alabama Gov. Kay Ivey in a dispute over where school voucher recipients can play sports this year
